properties.script:
import requests
import json
open_phish = [{'data': []}]
req = requests.get('https://openphish.com/feed.txt').text
big_increment = 0
increment = 0
for r in req.split('\n'):
    if r == '':
        continue
    open_phish[big_increment]['data'].append({'type': 'url', 'value': r})
    increment += 1
    if increment >= 30:
        open_phish.append({'data': []})
        big_increment +=1
        increment = 0

urls = json.dumps(open_phish)
